abstract: Neel Jani drives a Red Bull F1 car around the new Formula One circuit in India.
snippet: Neel Jani drives a Red Bull F1 car around the new Formula One circuit in India.
lead_paragraph: We have heard so little coming out of India about the state of the new Formula One track, where the Indian Grand Prix will take place next week, that we had to see it for ourselves.

headline.main: Video From the Track in India
